author: By ELLEN KNICKMEYER Associated Press
title: Oil industry cites virus in seeking broad pollution waivers
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Environmental Protection Agency said Tuesday that it’s reviewing a request from the oil and gas industry to ease enforcement of hazardous air and water pollution and other regulatory issues during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
WASHINGTON (AP) The Environmental Protection Agency said Tuesday that its reviewing a request from the oil and gas industry to ease enforcement of hazardous air and water pollution and other regulatory issues during the coronavirus pandemic.
